News

Three women were victims of accidents in the Penzen region a day.

On Friday, 22 December, in Penza province, three female nurses were in hospital beds as a result of accidents.

The cupcakes don't find it. The Chadians are discussing the visit of Deda Moroza.

The fierce dispute erupted after the arrival of the Deda Morosa Train to the Chaadaevka city of Penza oblast.
23.12.2023

A Russian student who transported 673 kilograms of cocaine was a drug dealer.


The narcocourier, carrying 673 kilograms of cocaine seized in Moscow, was a 20-year-old student. MK.ru reports this.
23.12.2023

The demolished urban recidivist will go to the strict regime colony


A 30-year-old citizen of townisha, formerly convicted of theft and murder, will return to the barbed wire. He last left the place of detention in January this year, and he had committed a number of crimes in September.
23.12.2023

In the Russian region, a ban on telephones in teacher schools was proposed


In Sverdlov province, they wanted to impose a ban on teachers ' telephones. A similar proposal was made by the Commissioner for the Rights of the Child in the Russian region, Igor Morokov, writing " Moscow Soldiers " .
23.12.2023

92.3 per cent of Penza money will be spent on urban programmes


On Friday, 22 December, the deputies of the Penzen City Duma approved the budget for 2024. The draft document had previously been considered at the five commissions and the joint meeting of the commissions of pride.
23.12.2023

Kirkorov wanted to strip the ranks of the Russian National Artist.


Phillip Kirkorov's estrad singer wanted to strip the ranks of the Russian National Artist for taking part in the scandal party of the blogers and the television host of Anastasia Ivleeva. This proposal was made by the head of the Federal Project on Security and Anti-Corruption (OPBC), Vitaly Borodin, informs Mash.
23.12.2023

In Penza, four cars were hit by an accident.


On Saturday, 23 December, there were a number of road traffic accidents in Penze and the county. This is reported by eyewitnesses at the " Connect " social media.
23.12.2023

In Russia, duties for the import of chicken meat were cancelled.


In Russia, duties for the import of chicken meat were cancelled for 2024. The Government has approved the relevant decree.
23.12.2023

Before they buy the food, the penzens will be advised to knock a gun about the land.


The specialists of the PKR office gave advice on the choice of a new year's tree. They recalled that buying black logs from their hands was illegal. It's only necessary to acquire it in official sales points - on trees.
23.12.2023

How do you not get into a road accident with bad visibility?


What if there's a bad sight on the road because of the fog, but you need to go?
23.12.2023

In Russia, it was proposed to reduce the GSC tariffs in the new year ' s holidays.


In Russia, it was proposed to lower the rates for housing and utilities (HC) for several categories of Russians on the days of the new annual holidays. A member of the Committee of the State for Construction and Housing and Community Management (GCC), Alexander Yakubovski, informed RIA Novostice, took the initiative.
23.12.2023

Narovcha was stolen in Mordovia Citroen and went home.


A 21-year-old citizen of the Penza region was detained in the Kovlik district of the Republic of Mordovia on suspicion of theft.
23.12.2023

The rights of one category of drivers in the Russian Federation will become invalid as of 1 April


The rights of one category of drivers will be invalid in Russia from 1 April 2024. At that time, Act 313-FZ, which regulates the admission of citizens ' cars to foreign driving permits, was brought to the attention of Kirill Danilov ' s lawyer in an interview with the Praim Agency.
23.12.2023

Silent Hill: a new one-year decoration in the village of Michurin led to disputes


The decoration of the Michurinski settlement in the Penza region was caused by the user of the Société Vontacte. The pictures he published sealed up a fully dark tree with a negligible girland.
23.12.2023

Sexologist has spread popular myths about male infidelity.


Contrary to the pervasive belief of a man not polygamous, a doctor-sexologist, a therapist, Andrei Bulah. In the commentary for Lenta.ru, the specialist dispelled a few more popular myths about male infidelity.
23.12.2023

In the Penzen Region, the inspectors assisted the driver from Kazakhstan


On Friday, 22 December, in the Penza region, the inspectors returned to help the driver in distress.
22.12.2023

The North-West Cyclone will return to the Penza region


On Saturday, 23 December, there will be rain and wet snow in the Penza region. That's what synoptics predicted.
22.12.2023

The drunken sorad tried to kill a friend with two knives.


In Serdoska, a friend's party ended up bleeding. Women had a fight, and one of them went for a knife, or two.
22.12.2023

23 December - Long-range Air Day


On 23 December 1914, by decree of Emperor Nikolay II, the world ' s first squadron of such aircraft was formed.
22.12.2023

A shark may appear in Penza in 2024.


Soon, the Penns won't have to go to other people's aquaparks, they'll have their own in the regional center. The head of the city, Alexander Basenko, expressed his confidence at a meeting with journalists on Friday, 22 December.
22.12.2023

New Year and Christmas in Penza: programme of activities


The new year and Christmas in Penza will be celebrated on several sites. How fun and free time on vacation days can be learned from the afish prepared by the city administration.
22.12.2023

Electricity or electrical?


The new area is built, its electrification is being discussed. Or is it better to say "electrification"? What letter, O or E, should be in the word?
22.12.2023

In the region, 118 children have been affected by accidents since the beginning of the year


Since the beginning of the year, there have been 92 cases of passenger children in the Penzen region. 1 child killed, 117 injured.
22.12.2023

Penzens in houses with deactivated heating will help warm guns.


Additional equipment has been made available to the NGS Pensentiary Department to provide emergency services 24 hours a day.
22.12.2023

In the main park of Penza, they'll build a free children's landing.


The V. G. Belinsky Park will have a free space for children. On Friday, 22 December, the head of Penza, Alexander Basenko, spoke at a meeting with journalists.
22.12.2023

Russia has been convicted for five years for calling for mobilized desertions


In Uf, the court sentenced a local resident, Ramil Ghalim (formerly the name of Saitov, to the list of terrorists and extremists) to five years of general regime colony for calls to be mobilized to defect weapons. This was reported to Lente.ru in the press service of the Kirov District Court of the City.
22.12.2023

Chapter Penza expressed his view on transport reform


On Friday, 22 December, at a meeting with journalists, President Penza Alexander Basenko expressed his views on transport reform to be implemented in the coming years.
22.12.2023

Russia broke the head of a 11-year-old boy on a mountain.


In Uf, a man broke his head on a 11-year-old boy who hurt his son. The victim's mother told the Ufa-1 portal.
22.12.2023

The Rossian military personnel will not be allowed to pass the rights examination


The Russians, who evade the appearance of the military, will not be admitted to the driver ' s test. This is reported by the TAS with reference to the press centre of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia.
22.12.2023

The sudden impact of female tears on men has been revealed


The researchers of the Weitzman Institute of Science in Israel have revealed that women ' s tears contain chemicals that block male aggression. The results of the study, which show unexpected tears to brain activity, are published in PLoS Biology.
22.12.2023

Moment of the accident: Prior to the collision, Route No. 77 was travelling to red


A hard-core accident with an overturned route No. 77 on the intersection of Lermontov and Krasna was recorded by a video recorder. The accident happened on Friday, 22 December.
22.12.2023

Turmodom told partners about plans for a new year


"Termodom" is the holding of traditions. One is to discuss the results of the year with partners, with plans for the coming months.
22.12.2023

The Public Prosecutor ' s Office was interrupted by the delay in the construction of the Zasek road


The construction began in February and was expected to be completed no later than 20 November. A new route along the street of the Olympics was to unload the entrance to the provincial centre on the Penza-Shemashek route.
22.12.2023

There's a video of the moment of the death crash on the GPA.


There's a video on the Network that sealed the moment of the death crash on the Izmaylov street with a pedestrian.
